title: How to Make Soy and Parsley Spread

steps.headline: Sauté the onion and celery in the olive oil until soft.
Add the parsley and other seasonings.
Add the ground soybeans and mix well.
Taste and adjust seasonings as necessary.
Use.
steps.description: Spread on sandwich bread or on raw vegetables.

text: Sauté the onion and celery in the olive oil until soft.  Add the parsley and other seasonings.  Simmer briefly.  Add the ground soybeans and mix well.  Taste and adjust seasonings as necessary.  Use. Spread on sandwich bread or on raw vegetables.
